'''Hats''' are a form of head [[armour]]. Unlike [[helmet]]s, they provide no base [[AC]], but can be used by characters with [[beak]]s and all but the largest of [[horns]] and [[antennae]]. They can be maximally [[scroll of enchant armour|enchanted]] to +2.

Hats can have the following [[ego]]s:
*[[Intelligence]] (+3)
*[[Willpower]] (+40)
*[[Stealth]] (+50)
*[[See invisible]]

==History==
*Prior to [[0.27]], hats couldn't have [[Stealth]] ego.
*Prior to [[0.20]], hats could have [[Spirit shield]] ego.
*Prior to [[0.19]], you could find hats with cold and fire resistance egos in [[ice cave]]s and [[volcano]]es respectively.
*Hats were added in [[0.14]], consolidating [[wizard hat]]s and [[cap]]s.
